org.qbroker.common

Class GenericLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.qbroker.common.GenericLogger

  • public class GenericLogger
extends java.lang.Object
    GenericLogger is a generic logger with append() and overwrite(). It opens the log file everytime and closes it after the output.

    It also supports event logging via the static methods of info(), notice(), warning(), err(), and crit(). It is for breaking the circular dependencies of Maven modules.
    Author:
    yannanlu@yahoo.com
